SYSTEM_CALL.reason: Executes operating system commands directly which may lead to command injection or remote code execution.
review_checklist: Ensure no user-controlled input is passed to the command
Avoid shell execution unless absolutely necessary

FILE_OPERATION.reason: Handles file system access which may expose sensitive files or allow path traversal.
review_checklist: Ensure user input is not directly used in file paths

INPUT_HANDLING.reason: Processes untrusted input that may influence sensitive operations.
review_checklist: Avoid passing raw input to sensitive functions

AUTHENTICATION_LOGIC.reason: Critical security logic related to identity.
